sentences.en: A legislative body unquestionably fashions new law.
sentences.cn: 立法机关所制定的无疑是新的法律.

sentences.en: And Aileen Butler was unquestionably the most significant element of romance in it.
sentences.cn: 而爱玲·巴特勒当然表现着热情浪漫的最显著的气质.

sentences.en: But he had seen it, unquestionably he had seen it!
sentences.cn: 但是他已看到了, 毫无疑问,他已看到了!

sentences.en: But now, this thing had actually and unquestionably failed.
sentences.cn: 可是现在, 它千真万确地失败了.

sentences.en: He is unquestionably the best tennis player in England.
sentences.cn: 他无疑是英国最好的网球手.

sentences.en: Hoban would unquestionably circle and make for the troop transports.
sentences.cn: 胡班必然会迂回航行,去袭击兵船.

sentences.en: It was Christminster, unquestionably; either directly seen, or miraged in the peculiar atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 那毫无疑问就是基督寺了, 若不是直接用眼睛看出来的, 就是间接由奇特的大气反映出来的.

sentences.en: Perhaps they begged -- unquestionably they did.
sentences.cn: 也许他们靠乞讨生活 -- 对,他们肯定是靠乞讨生活.

sentences.en: The Eiffel Tower is unquestionably one of Paris’s most familiar landmarks.
sentences.cn: 埃菲尔铁塔无疑是巴黎最为人熟知的地标之一。

sentences.en: They have seen the change as unquestionably beneficial to the country.
sentences.cn: 他们认为这个变革对该国无疑是非常有益的。

sentences.en: Unquestionably it was a pretty coat - very.
sentences.cn: 这当然是一件漂亮外套,很漂亮.

sentences.en: Unquestionably Syme will be vaporized, Winston thought again.
sentences.cn: 赛姆真的要给蒸发掉,这绝对没问题.

sentences.en: Unquestionably the interior of the earth is hot.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问,地球内部是热的.

sentences.en: Unquestionably, acidity is also modified by other genes, regardless of any major gene effects.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问, 不管酸度受任何主基因的影响酸度同样由其它的基因所修饰.
无疑地, 她应该得奖.

words.tran_cn: 毫无疑问的；确实的；无可挑剔的

trans.tran_en: used to emphasize that something is certainly true
